Attacks.Name: Moonblast
Attacks.Effect: If a wild is rolled during this attack, the target character is given the Hex special condition.

Attacks.Name: Outrage
Attacks.Effect: If a wild is rolled during this attack, the target character is given the Stagger special condition, then Drageraph gains the Stun special condition.

Attacks.Name: Dazzling Gleam
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, this character gains power equal to the damage dealt.

Superpowers.Name: Healing Wish
Superpowers.Effect: Remove up to 3 damage tokens from an allied character within Range 3. Drageraph then gains the Stun special condition.

Superpowers.Name: Dragon Dance
Superpowers.Effect: This character gains 2 additional dice on its next attack and increases its movement by one size until the end of the turn.

Attacks.Name: Draco Meteor
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, Drageraph's attack dice are reduced by 2 for its next attack.
